title: (x) "Pain is weakness leaving the body" rough brush script - Edo {Mike F}
content:
I posted this before and someone thought it was BrushStroke Fast by Pat Snyder. Pat Snyder sent me his font and it does not match. Any other guesses??

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pain.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142906/http:/typophile.com/files/pain.jpg) | 171.76 KB |

 [‹ "Fuel for Life" type in Diesel commercial](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142906/http:/typophile.com/node/38520 "Go to previous forum topic") [RDS Tuscan/circus font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142906/http:/typophile.com/node/38404 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Jeremy9107

comments.content:
This is NOT the same image you posted before:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/38073](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142906/http:/typophile.com/node/38073 "http://typophile.com/node/38073")

That WAS Brush Stroke Fast. This one I don’t know.

Aha ... it’s Vic Fieger’s [Edo](http://web.archive.org/web/20071104142906/http:/www.dafont.com/edo.font?nb_ppp=50&text=PAIN+IS+WEAKNESS).

Are you sure you posted the right image this time, Jeremy?

Mike F,

You are right. I accidentally posted the Brush Stroke Fast version. I will start a new post with the original lettering. Do you still think it is Edo.... it seems a bit off.

Jeremy
Yes, it is definitely Edo - manually condensed a bit.
